cause.description:
Please visit the site below to join our team and/or donate:
http://www.raceforthecure-denver.com/site/TR/Race/General?px=1351341&pg=personal&fr_id=1050&s_tafId=10992
Since starting the breast cancer movement 25 years ago, Susan G. Komen for the Cure has transformed the clinic and the culture — how the world talks about and treats this devastating disease — and helped turn millions of breast cancer patients into survivors. In that time, Komen will have invested nearly $1 billion into breast cancer research and community outreach programs, becoming the largest source of non-profit funds fighting the disease.
We've come a long way, but the fight isn’t over yet. Our mission won’t be complete until we end breast cancer forever. So, in the next decade, Komen is committing another $1 billion to that end.
1. The Promise: to save lives and end breast cancer forever by empowering people, ensuring quality care for all and energizing science to find the cures.
2. The Vision: A world without breast cancer.
cause.mission: Raise money for the Susan G. Komen Breast Cancer Foundation
